actions.name: Triage (Emergency)
actions.description: Effect: The user may Move, using any Movement they still have for the current Round, and use a [Healing] Action on their Active List as a Free Action.

actions.name: Triage
actions.description: Effect: The user's [Healing] Actions gain [Priority 3] or [Priority X+3].
